author: ate
msg: Adding a new ContainerRequiredRequestResponseWrapper marker interface to protect against too aggressive request unwrapping as done before a Portlet is invoked.
This was causing authentication state (UserPrincipal) as setup by the PortalFilter with the PortalRequestWrapper to get "lost" for invoked portlets.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-3776] Fix case of 'settings' in the schemaLocation for conf/settings.xml
